like, the gradients
starts at 0 which is the iconic orange gradient

0. 00C8FF 00C8FF 0000FF 0000FF
1. FFC8C8 FFC8C8 E1A0A0 E1A0A0
2. 00C880 00C880 000080 000080
3. 0000FF 0000FF 000080 000080
4. FFFFFF FFFFFF FFFFFF FFFFFF
5. F56600 F56600 F56600 F56600
6. 0000F6 0000F6 0000F6 0000F6
7. 00DC5B 00DC5B 00DC5B 00DC5B
8. F500F5 F500F5 F500F5 F500F5
9. FF00A9 FF00A9 FF00A9 FF00A9
10. 00CCAA 00CCAA 00CCAA 00CCAA
11. E6E600 E6E600 E6E600 E6E600
12. FF0055 FF0055 FF0055 FF0055
13. 806040 806040 806040 806040
14. 00D3E6 00D3E6 00D3E6 00D3E6
15. 007FFF 007FFF 007FFF 007FFF
16. 4797CC 4797CC 4797CC 4797CC
17. FFBF40 FFBF40 FFBF40 FFBF40
18. FFFFFF FFFFFF FFFFFF FFFFFF
19. 808080 808080 808080 808080
20. 50E680 50E680 50E680 50E680
21. 000000 000000 000000 000000
22. 404040 FFFFFF FFFFFF 404040
23. 808080 808080 808080 808080
24. FF4800 FF4800 FF4800 FF4800
25. 0007F4 0007F4 0007F4 0007F4
26. 00AA00 00AA00 00AA00 00AA00
27. 00BCFF 00BCFF 00BCFF 00BCFF
28. 0000C0 0000C0 000080 000080
29. 88FF88 88FF88 208120 208120
